channel.title: Comments on: Phone Glitch Helps Inmate Bond Himself Out Of Jail
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Ray Hollister
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description:
"He now faces additional charges of grand theft and scheming with the intent to defraud."
Another story of the little guy getting screwed. I wonder if the situation was reversed would Global Tel*Link be charged with anything?
item.content:encoded:
“He now faces additional charges of grand theft and scheming with the intent to defraud.”

Another story of the little guy getting screwed. I wonder if the situation was reversed would Global Tel*Link be charged with anything?
